intro.title: Clue one
text: Thank you for accepting my challenge.
Throughout the hunt you will be asked a series of riddles. In order to find the treasure, you must correctly answer each riddle.
When you think you have the correct answer, type in the box below and press submit.
Type 'trap' in the box and hit submit to proceed.
intro.hint: Haha, you fell into my trap - the correct answer here is 'answer'. Be careful going forwards.
